well in order to know about magic steel
we first need to know about real steel
steel is an alloy a combination of a
metal with one or more other elements
steel is mostly iron but it has some
other ingredients including a mandatory
amount of carbon up to about 2% even a
small change in the quantity of material
in an alloy can dramatically change the
properties of the end material the
characteristics of Valyrian steel can

for a high carbon steel problem is the

the mix Steel's pretty much always the

this isn't a sign of superb quality and

maybe the best possible match might be a
